org.zaproxy.zap.extension.sessionfixationscan
Class SessionFixation

java.lang.Object
  org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.AbstractPlugin
      org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.AbstractAppPlugin
          org.zaproxy.zap.extension.sessionfixationscan.SessionFixation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Runnable, org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Plugin
public class SessionFixation
extends org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.AbstractAppPlugin

The SessionFixation plugin identifies Session Fixation vulnerabilities with - cookie fields (a more common scenario, but also more secure, even when the vulnerability occurs) - url fields (less common, but also less secure when the vulnerability occurs) - session ids built into the url path, and typically extracted by means of url rewriting TODO: implement the check for form fields (POST parameters).

Author:
Colm O'Flaherty, Encription Ireland Ltd
